title: Drawing, "Oddington Church Yard, Gloucestershire, North West View", 1843
medium: Pen and black ink; brush and black and gray wash on cream wove paper
inscribed: Below image in ink: Oddington Church, Gloucestershire / North West View from the Churchyard, 1843
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: View of the side of the church across the churchyard. Ivy covered suqare tower at center. Clusters of trees at left and right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Oddington Church Yard, Gloucestershire, North West View", 1843.
1843. Pen and black ink; brush and black and gray wash on cream wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1947-106-3.
